Issue.creator: ratnakar
Issue.summary: NodeSDK doc issue : node and npm versions should be corrected
Issue.description: =6.7.0", "npm": ">=3.0.0" {code} Logs for reference. It is good to have *Troubleshoot section* : In some cases the npm installed using apt-get could be an older version than what is required and normally installed along with Node. To resolve this version compatibility issue, Download and extarct the nodejs tar from here https://nodejs.org/dist/v6.9.1 and set *bin* to your PATH >
